name: The Unicycle Adventure 2
description:
In this game you play as Uki (yellow) or ToiletMan (black). You must collect flags and purple triangles on various worlds.

The game includes:

A save system

8 Unique and interesting levels

3 boss fights

5 Reverse levels

3 Stealth levels

2 playable characters

Concerning Sound effects

and Controller support.

(This is the sequel to The Unicycle Adventure. I suggest playing the first game before this one but it doesn't really matter.)
